name: Azurite
description: A soft, semi-precious copper ore with a deep blue color.

name: Banded Agate
description: An orange semi-precious stone with bands of grey and brown.

name: Blue Quartz
description: A common blue crystal.

name: Eye Agate
description: A gemstone with a raindrop pattern of whites or greys.

name: Hematite
description: A shiny, black iron ore with magnetic properties.

name: Lapis Lazuli
description: A deep blue semi-precious stone with an intense color.

name: Malachite
description: A green copper ore regarded as a semi-precious stone.

name: Moss Agate
description: A white gemstone with fractal green patterns resembling moss.

name: Obsidian
description: A shiny, black, brittle volcanic rock.  When chipped, obsidian can become extremely sharp.

name: Rhodochrosite
description: A rosy gemstone with streaks of white.

name: Tiger's Eye
description: A reddish brown gemstone with a single white streak through the middle.

name: Turquoise
description: A blue-green semi-precious stone with brown or tan marbling.

name: Bloodstone
description: A black stone mottled with patches of reddish orange.

name: Carnelian
description: A brownish-red semi-precious gemstone.

name: Chalcedony
description: A waxy, brownish gemstone.

name: Chrysoprase
description: An apple green gemstone.

name: Citrine
description: A yellow form of quartz.

name: Jasper
description: A reddish white gemstone.

name: Moonstone
description: A milky white gemstone with connections to the Feywild.

name: Onyx
description: A stone composed of bands of white and black.

name: Quartz
description: A common mineral with a milky white color.

name: Sardonyx
description: A form of onyx with a red tint.

name: Star Rose Quartz
description: A rosy form of quartz with a star pattern.

name: Zircon
description: A reddish brown gemstone.

name: Amber
description: An orange gemstone composed of fossilized tree sap.

name: Amethyst
description: A purple formed of quartz.

name: Chrysoberyl
description: A yellowish-green gemstone related to beryl.

name: Coral
description: Actually a living creature found in warm water, which covers its body with natural stone.

name: Garnet
description: A deep red gemstone.

name: Jade
description: A grayish green, opaque gemstone.

name: Jet
description: A pure black, shiny gemstone.

name: Pearl
description: A round, milky white gemstone produced by clams.

name: Spinel
description: A red gemstone similar to a ruby.

name: Tourmaline
description: A dark yellow or indigo gemstone.

name: Aquamarine
description: A light blue form of beryl.

name: Black Pearl
description: A rare black version of a pearl.

name: Blue Spinel
description: A blue form of spinel.

name: Peridot
description: A green gemstone mottled with brown.

name: Topaz
description: A golden gemstone.

name: Black Opal
description: A predominantly black, but irridescent gemstone.

name: Blue Sapphire
description: A blue form of corundum.

name: Emerald
description: A green form of beryl.

name: Fire Opal
description: A predominantly red and orange, but irridescent gemstone.

name: Opal
description: An irridescent gemstone.

name: Star Ruby
description: A ruby with a predominant star pattern.

name: Star Sapphire
description: A sapphire with a predominant star pattern.

name: Yellow Sapphire
description: A yellow form of corundum.

name: Black Sapphire
description: A black form of corundum.

name: Diamond
description: An incredibly hard, clear gemstone.

name: Jacinth
description: A purified form of zircon, with a deeper color.

name: Ruby
description: A bright-red form of corundum.
